short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert currencies across Numbering Systems with ease!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Currency Converter with numbering system options allow users to quickly display currencies across different numbering systems such as millions, billions, lakh, crore. 

Whether you are a a finance enthusiast, frequent traveler, or an online shopper, this extension provides a seamless solution to convert currencies effortlessly.

Why you should install it?
Real-Time Exchange Rates
Save Time and Effort from manual currency conversions
Accurate and Reliable
Tailored for Global Users

Please feel free to suggest more currencies and numbering systems in the comments that you would like to include in future updates!

No user information is stored beyond this session.
